title: Andy 1.0.0 Released
content: Initial release of Andy - Addon Analyzer! This addon helps protect the ESO community by identifying malicious, stolen, paywalled, or ToS/EULA-violating addons. Features include automatic monitoring, manual scanning, customizable alerts, and suppression support.

title: LibText Addon Flagged
content: The LibText console addon by TheStylishIrish has been identified as malicious. It contains a denylist that silently blocks some players' messages, market postings, and more. This addon has been removed by Bethesda. This discovery prompted the creation of Andy to help protect the community.
